txt.en: You have defeated Gortheron the Doom-caller
The wings of Ost Dunhoth have been cleared, and now the way to the central area is unsealed.
'I am here! What has happened, my friends?'
'The way to the central area of Ost Dunhoth is open, [placeholder]. Gortheron awaits within.'
The central area of Ost Dunhoth is open.

'You have ended Ivar's insurrection and put an end to his master? But what is this you say of Gandalf?'

Túgonn listens as you describe the strange events surrounding the defeat of Gortheron.

'It is hope beyond hope if what you say is true, [placeholder], but I dare not believe it. It may be some final illusion of Gortheron's. I cannot trust this, though my heart wish it be so. I can think of no better omen than if our Wizard be returned to us!'
Túgonn is in the entrance of Ost Dunhoth.
'The central area of Ost Dunhoth is unsealed, [placeholder]. Gortheron awaits within!'

'You have ended Ivar's insurrection and put an end to his master? But what is this you say of Gandalf?'

Túgonn listens as you describe the strange events surrounding the defeat of Gortheron.

'It is hope beyond hope if what you say is true, [placeholder], but I dare not believe it. It may be some final illusion of Gortheron's. I cannot trust this, though my heart wish it be so. I can think of no better omen than if our Wizard be returned to us!'
Fight through Ost Dunhoth and defeat Gortheron
Talk to Túgonn in Ost Dunhoth
